analysis.description:
OldXRPCToken (/unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol#98-105) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol#98-99)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol:
	Contract HOPEToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol#238-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol#5-7): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of HOPEToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/26/0x10eee0274b7d7d11330e3b7d06a2325d72d9d326.sol#245) is not in mixedCase
